data.text:
Hotel Alpenroesli

Giswil

The Hotel Alpenroesli enjoys a quiet location in Giswil. It offers Swiss home-style cuisine, a panoramic terrace with mountain views, 2 saunas, a bowling alley, and an indoor pool There wellness centre also includes 2 hot tubs, a steam bath, and a..... view morefrom

CHF 90Landgasthof Grossteil

Giswil

Enjoying an idyllic location between the mountains and the Sarnersee lake, the family-run Landgasthof Grossteil offers fine Swiss cuisine, free Wi-Fi and simply furnished rooms... view morefrom

CHF 70Holiday Home Margrith Grossteil-Giswil

Giswil

Chalet "Margrith". On the outskirts, 6 km from the centre, in a quiet, sunny position on a slope. Private: meadow. Garden furniture, barbecue. In Winter: please take snow chains. Shop 5.5 km, restaurant 5.5 km, railway station 5.5 km... view morefrom

CHF 113Grandswiss Hotel

Giswil

Grandswiss Hotel in Giswil provides mountain and lake views and offers various leisure facilities on site, such as a game's room, billiard, table tennis and a Shisha lounge. Free WiFi is available in the lobby... view morefrom

CHF 80Kultur-Hotel Krone Giswil

Giswil

Kultur-Hotel Krone Giswil is surrounded by the Pilatus, Titlis and Jungfrau Mountains and is just a 20-minute drive away from Lucerne. The property features a sauna, Turkish steam bath, and a terrace with views of the surrounding landscape... view morefrom
